items.sentence: I need to know why you didn\'t come yesterday.
Do you really think Tom will let you help him?
We won\'t have time to do anything else today.
We\'ll see each other tomorrow in the library.
We\'re facing a much bigger problem than that.
Tom didn\'t have enough money to pay the bill.
Tom didn\'t know when Mary had come to Boston.
Tom didn\'t notice that he was being followed.
Tom didn\'t seem interested in making friends.
I\'m not sure whether Tom will do that or not.
